widgets.name: OBS Studio
widgets.description: Scenes, sources, browser sources, and all the visuals. This is where the stream picture comes from — overlays, game capture, and the HTML widgets I run as browser sources.

widgets.name: StreamElements
widgets.description: Overlays, loyalty, alerts, and the bits that plug into Twitch. I use it alongside my own HTML widgets and Streamer.bot so everything stays in sync.

widgets.name: Streamer.bot
widgets.description: Chat commands, channel point actions, and automation. The brain behind custom logic — from simple triggers to full workflows. All my actions and imports live here.

widgets.name: Touch Portal
widgets.description: One-tap control from my phone or tablet: scene switches, Streamer.bot actions, and shortcuts. No need to alt-tab — everything is a button away.

widgets.name: VoiceMeeter
widgets.description: Audio routing and mixing so game, music, mic, and alerts all land in the right place. Virtual cables and strips so the stream hears exactly what I want.

widgets.name: VoiceMod
widgets.description: Voice effects and real-time modulation. When I want to sound different on stream — or just a bit more fun — VoiceMod is in the chain.

widgets.name: Custom HTML widgets
widgets.description: Stuff I build myself: overlays, mini-apps, and browser sources that talk to Streamer.bot and OBS. King-Queen, Rocksmith, and whatever I ship next.

widgets.name: Commands & inventory
widgets.description: Every chat command, grouped by feature. Nexi, USER INVENTORY, mod tools, raffles, and more. The full DexNeXuS Inventory catalog is at the bottom of that page.

widgets.name: Streaming rota
widgets.description: When I'm next live — current time, next stream, and the week ahead. Game streams, music streams, and the schedule I actually follow.

widgets.name: Simple Clock
widgets.description: Minimal HH:MM:SS clock. Copy URL into OBS Browser Source or download and run locally.

widgets.name: Hello Text
widgets.description: Static text in a soft card. Copy URL for OBS, or download and edit the HTML to change the copy.

widgets.name: Countdown
widgets.description: MM:SS countdown (e.g. starting soon). Copy URL or download and edit the target time in the script. How to explains how.

widgets.name: Date Display
widgets.description: Today's date (e.g. Wed, 12 Feb 2025). Copy URL or download and edit the HTML for locale/format.

widgets.name: Fade Text
widgets.description: Text with a gentle pulsing fade. Copy URL or download and edit the HTML for your message.

widgets.name: Typewriter / text effects
widgets.description: Cycling text with typewriter, word-by-word, or reveal effects. Use as a loading screen or rotating messages. Customise via URL: effect, lines (comma-separated), interval, typing_speed. No editing required.

widgets.name: Viewer Placeholder
widgets.description: Static '0 viewers' placeholder. Copy URL or download; replace with your own API call for live count.
